author: [Jericho....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103491237475970207715/)
title: AI kicks Vines of Vastwood without paying

comments.body:
Thanks for catching this. In our switch of kicker to the new additional cost system, I only tested to make sure the player payed the cost. Since the player pays by tapping lands it works fine. The AI on the other hand doesn't directly tap lands, it just determines a way to pay. The cost event itself needs to make the AI pay up.

**Status:** Accepted
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 46f947cf3ec8 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [Jericho....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103491237475970207715/) on July 20, 2013 01:05:08_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. AI casts Vines of Vastwood 
2. AI choose to pay the kicker cost 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? the AI taps anything that could produce a green mana. Nothing happens instead What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.39 win 7 home If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). LOG (P): Jericho may (no) take a mulligan.
LOG (C): Computer may (yes) take a mulligan. Computer may (no) take a mulligan.
LOG (P): Play Island.
LOG (P): Tap Island. Pay {U}. Play Hedron Crab.
LOG (P): Put Hedron Crab onto the battlefield.
